snippet: Senate Democratic leaders are beginning to heighten efforts to prevent nearly $8 trillion in automatic tax increases and spending cuts come January.
abstract: Senate Democratic leaders are heightening their efforts to prevent nearly $8 trillion in automatic tax increases and spending cuts that are scheduled to take effect in January 2013; economists have warned of an eminent fiscal crisis if the cuts are not averted.
lead_paragraph: Senate Democratic leaders are beginning to heighten efforts to prevent nearly $8 trillion in automatic tax increases and spending cuts come January.

headline.seo: Push for Fiscal Pact Picks Up Speed, and Power
headline.main: Push for a Fiscal Pact Picks Up Speed, and Power
headline.print_headline: Push for a Fiscal Pact Picks Up Speed, and Power
